meanings.sent1: She was unleveling the table by placing books under one leg.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers were unleveling the ground to prepare for the new building.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat kept unleveling the stack of papers by pushing them off the desk.
meanings.sent4: His careless actions were unleveling the carefully laid plans for the event.
meanings.sent5: The heavy rain was unleveling the once smooth driveway, creating bumps and holes.

meanings.definition: The act of making something not level.
meanings.sent1: The unleveling of the floor was causing the furniture to wobble.
meanings.sent2: The unleveling of the road made driving difficult for the residents.
meanings.sent3: The unleveling of the cake layers resulted in a lopsided birthday cake.
meanings.sent4: The unleveling of the playing field gave the underdog team an advantage.
meanings.sent5: The unleveling of the shelf caused all the items to slide to one side.
